comments.body: What changed here to require this now but not before?
we now fully qualify everything in the generated generics instances. but this will now also print out qualified names in the pattern, which isn't allowed.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +156,160 @@_unComp1_RDR = varQual_RDR gHC_GENERICS (fsLit "unComp1")

from_RDR  = mkRdrUnqual $ mkOccName varName "from" -- from/to appears as pattern and can not be qualified.
_from1_RDR = varQual_RDR gHC_GENERICS (fsLit "from1")
to_RDR    = mkRdrUnqual $ mkOccName varName "to" -- from/to appears as pattern and can not be qualified.
